titleStmt.title: A declaration of His Highness, for a collection towards the relief of divers Protestant churches driven out of Poland; and of twenty Protestant families driven out of the confines of Bohemia.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills, and John Field, Printers to His Highness,
